cellularAutomata.lattice.view.listener
Class AnalysisDrawingListener

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      cellularAutomata.lattice.view.listener.AnalysisDrawingListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
public class AnalysisDrawingListener
extends java.util.Observable
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

A mouse listener that notifies analysis of any cells that are clicked, selected, or "drawn".

While this class is listening to the graphics, it also has to notify the analyses. In other words, this class is both a listener and is being "listened to"!

This class uses the Observer design pattern so that it can be "listened to". Analyses are attached as observers.

Author:
David Bahr

Method Detail

drawCell

public void drawCell(Cell cell,
                     int xPos,
                     int yPos)
Draws the specified cell at the specified position on the graphics.

Parameters:
cell - The CA cell that will be drawn.
xPos - The x-position of the cursor. The cell is placed in the lattice position that falls under the cursor.
yPos - The y-position of the cursor. The cell is placed in the lattice position that falls under the cursor.
